ActWrecked, Abandoned or Hazardous Vessels Act
SubjectWreck Removal Convention Certificate Fee Regulations
PrecisWRECK REMOVAL CONVENTION CERTIFICATE FEE REGULATIONS in order to partially recover the costs for providing the service of assessing and certifying the validity and adequacy of marine insurance in accordance with the requirements under Canadian law and international conventions.
